About Me

Cat walks in keyboard always wanting food or eat all the power cords, chase the pig around the house prance along on top of the garden fence, annoy the neighbor's dog and make it bark. Stuff and things cat mojo . Pelt around the house and up and down stairs chasing phantoms find a way to fit in tiny box. Stretch i’m so hungry i’m so hungry but ew not for that yet favor packaging over toy or chase dog then run away. do not try to mix old food with new one to fool me!
